title: 3 and Out - Stafford Extension, Kyler and Wentz Bashing, Bezos Commanders, Carr's Vegas Future, Rodgers --> Broncos, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Stafford Extension, Kyler and Wentz Bashing, Bezos Commanders, Carr's Vegas Future, Rodgers --> Broncos, Mailbag
description:
John discusses if Matthew Stafford should take less money on his extension to help keep the Rams in Super Bowl contention, who he thinks is anonymously crushing Kyler Murray and Carson Wentz in the media. He also dives into some of the top headlines around the league, if the NFL could boot Dan Snyder to bring in Jeff Bezos in D.C., if the Raiders will trade Derek Carr, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
